CustomField.description: Sets default order value for business accounts to specify if applicable materials will be delivered to the company or to the students on associated bookings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies if applicable materials will be delivered to this account or to the students on associated bookings. If checked send to student's default delivery address, unchecked use Order delivery address.This preference can be changed on each order
CustomField.label: Deliver Materials to Student
